about_the_game:
This short, multi-perspective rhythm game explores a universal facet of human life: the call of nature.

Can you collect the will to get up late at night? Will you choose manners over self-care? Can you overcome barriers that you weren't even aware might be present on your journey to the loo? Explore the consequences of every possible choice related to going to the bathroom, but with none of the real-life fallout.

Features

  • Play through six levels, each with distinct and wacky scenarios!

  • Enjoy rhythm and some closed world exploration gameplay! The rhythm you play will control most player actions.

  • Explore first person and rearview perspectives in exploration phases of levels!

  • Battle through medium difficulty for challenging, but fun gameplay!
